item.description:
Dear friends,

A few years ago, I organized a comedy night for friends and business associates though a friend I made who owns a comedy club. If you were there, you remember how much fun it was.

Now that the Presidential Election is over,
EVENT SET FOR January 14th.

For those who missed last time, the ticket costs are taken care of, and your name will be at the door.

Please RSVP at your earliest!

Thanks and I hope to see you there.

- Vincent

Call 617-574-9676 for directions or go to
http://www.dickdohert...

Event Info Host: Vincent Weeichetti
Wednesday, January 14, 2009
Time: 8:30pm - 10:00pm

Location: The Comedy Vault at Remingtons
Street: 124 Boylston St, Directions at http://www.dickdohert...
City/Town: Boston, MA

Contact Info Phone: 6179221824
Email: chairmanve@aol.com
item.name: Comedy Thank you event, January 14th.
